page.title: 03Factories In Kingswood.
page.content: Along Station Road there is a row of factories.They produce a variety of products,such as frozen foods,tin ware etc. At Avon Tin, where they make tins,trays and ashtrays,part_workers earn about thirty eight pounds a week,and full_timers around sixty pounds. It does not cause inconvenence to anybody and is not noisy.The other factories also cause no inconvenience because the machinery is electric and there is no smoke pollution. All these factories are quite modern, the biggest factory along Station Road is Brains. It has seven hundred workers. They make frozen foods such as pasties,pies and faggots etc. One of the factories,Frenchay Products,has a glass front and looks like a big office,shop or school. Next year there will be one new factory which is being built at the moment in 1985.
